boardgame.name: Burgle Bros.
boardgame.description: Burgle Bros. is a cooperative game for 1-_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;shy;4 players. Players are unique members of a crew trying to pull off a robbery of a highly secure building _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;mdash; without getting caught. The building has three floors (4x4 tiles), each with its own safe to crack. Players start on the first floor and have to escape to their helicopter waiting on the roof._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Players each have three stealth tokens. Whenever they are on the same tile with a guard, they lose one. If any player is caught without a stealth token, the game is over. If players can open all three safes, and escape through the stairs to the roof they win._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

Opened but un-played and un-punched. Kickstarter Edition. This also includes the large, wooden tower that I bought at Salt Con as well as the light up alarms that are sold separately. This is an ultimate package! It is going to be a big box (due to the wood tower), which will be a bit heavy but we can work on that together to get it to you as affordable as possible. Local pickup with no shipping available if you live in the Seattle area. Item is in very good condition. I treat my games very well. If there are components inside the game they are most likely bagged in 4mm, thick bags. I will work with you to ship the most cost efficient way or however you prefer. When I ship things I take extra measurers to mitigate any potential shipping damage. If the item is a small card game the shipping will be USPS First Class and will be around $5 total with shipping materials.
In very good condition, played once. Stickers have not been used. Please see notes for more information.

This game has been opened but never played. Everything is complete and in excellent condition. I will ship via USPS Priority Mail so shipping is $14.

This game has been played twice - Kickstarter version. This game includes TWO towers - one which is great to leave assembled, and one which is compact to take on the go. Due to some unfortunate life events, I am forced to sell my board game collection. For several years I was paid to demo games and afterward, had the option of purchasing the game I demo’d. Because of this, most of my games are either new or have been played once. I have a large number of games for sale, some quite small, so please check my inventory to see if you’d like to purchase multiple items. I will work with you a bit on price if you do, and of course, it will save on shipping. I am an eBay top-rates seller with over 4200 positive feedback. I ship promptly and pack the items well. You will not receive beat-up games with pieces thrown all over inside the box. After purchase, buyer will be responsible for exact shipping charges. I accept PayPal only unless prearranged ahead of time.
